CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName,"Prospecting",1, "Opportunity Identified",2, "Proposal Submitted",3, "Negotiation",4, "Verbal Commitment",5, "Closed Won",6, "Closed Lost",7, "Declined",8, "Prospect",9, "Credentials/Meeting",10, "RFP/Pitch",11, "Active Scope",12, "Closed Won - Reconciled",13, "Cancelled",14, "Closed Won - Project Complete",15, "Initial Contact",16, "Term Negotiation",17, "Final Version/Term Sheet",18, "Execution - Signature",19, "Execution - Countersignature",20, 0)
CustomField.label: Stage Number
